instruction: i want a thriller about someone on the run and stopping a terrorist attack
output: If you're into heart-pounding chases and sneaky espionage, you’ve gotta check out Survivor! 🚨 Milla Jovovich is on the run trying to stop a huge terrorist attack in this intense thriller. Perfect for a night when you want all the action and mystery! 🎬
